value.title: Download your reports from the Power Bi service (powerbi.com) - Power BI Tips & Tricks #19
value.excerpt: In this video I will show you Microsoft's latest functionality added to the Power BI service (Powerbi.com).  This update was released last week (2016-Nov) and it allows you and your team to download the power bi reports from the service. I also explain why the functionality is not always enabled.   Looking

value.title: Fix the "Enter data" limitation in Power Query
value.excerpt: If you are trying to import data in Power BI using Power Query "Enter Data", you might see this message: "The clipboard contents are too large to be pasted into the table. Please split your data into multiple tables with less than 3,000 cells".  In this video I will show you one way to get around it.

value.title: How to create functions in Power Query
value.excerpt: In this video I will show you how to create a custom function in Power Query.  Custom functions are re-usable pieces of code. value.excerpt: You can turn on audit logs in Power BI to monitor what users are doing in Power BI.
